00026 // lbann_callback_print .hpp .cpp - Callback hooks to print information
00028 
00029 #include <vector>
00030 #include "lbann/callbacks/lbann_callback_print.hpp"
00031 
00032 namespace lbann {
00033 
00034 void lbann_callback_print::setup(model* m) {
00035 #ifdef LBANN_VERSION
00036   lbann_comm* comm = m->get_comm();
00037   if (comm->am_world_master()) {
00038     std::cout << "Training with LLNL LBANN version " << LBANN_VERSION << endl;
00039   }
00040 #endif
00041 }
00042 
00043 void lbann_callback_print::on_epoch_begin(model* m) {
00044   lbann_comm* comm = m->get_comm();
00045   if (comm->am_world_master()) {
00046     std::cout << "-----------------------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
00047     std::cout << "[" << m->get_cur_epoch() << "] Epoch" << std::endl;
00048     std::cout << "-----------------------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
00049   }
00050 }
00051 
00052 void lbann_callback_print::on_epoch_end(model* m) {
00053   lbann_comm* comm = m->get_comm();
00054   if (comm->am_model_master()) {
00055     DataType train_acc = m->get_train_accuracy();
00056     DataType validate_acc = m->get_validate_accuracy();
00057     if (comm->am_world_master()) {
00058       std::vector<DataType> train_accs(comm->get_num_models());
00059       std::vector<DataType> validate_accs(comm->get_num_models());
00060       comm->intermodel_gather(train_acc, train_accs);
00061       comm->intermodel_gather(validate_acc, validate_accs);
00062       for (size_t i = 0; i < train_accs.size(); ++i) {
00063         std::cout << "Model " << i;
00064         std::cout << " @" << m->get_cur_step() << " steps";
00065         std::cout << " Training accuracy: " << train_accs[i] << "%";
00066         std::cout << " Validation accuracy: " << validate_accs[i] << "%";
00067         std::cout << std::endl;
00068       }
00069     } else {
00070       comm->intermodel_gather(train_acc, comm->get_intermodel_master());
00071       comm->intermodel_gather(validate_acc, comm->get_intermodel_master());
00072     }
00073     for (Layer* layer : m->get_layers()) {
00074       layer->epoch_print();
00075     }
00076   }
00077 }
00078 
00079 void lbann_callback_print::on_test_end(model* m) {
00080   lbann_comm* comm = m->get_comm();
00081   if (comm->am_model_master()) {
00082     DataType test_acc = m->get_test_accuracy();
00083     if (comm->am_world_master()) {
00084       std::vector<DataType> accs(comm->get_num_models());
00085       comm->intermodel_gather(test_acc, accs);
00086       for (size_t i = 0; i < accs.size(); ++i) {
00087         std::cout << "Model " << i << " external validation accuracy: ";
00088         std::cout << accs[i] << "%" << std::endl;
00089       }
00090     } else {
00091       comm->intermodel_gather(test_acc, comm->get_intermodel_master());
00092     }
00093   }
00094 }
00095 
00096 }  // namespace lbann
